83454.summary: Some customers in the Blewett area of Nelson are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
83454.title: Sept 29 - Nelson (Blewett) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)

83443.title: Sept 29 - Calgary (Dalhousie) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
